intro: Heterotropa takaoi, commonly known as the Takao heterotropa, is a rare flowering plant native to Taiwan. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink. It grows in shaded, moist environments, often in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
